liquibase.change.AddNotNullConstraintChange

liquibase.change.AddNotNullConstraintChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.AddNotNullConstraintChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Adds a not-null constraint to an existing column.

Definition at line 27 of file AddNotNullConstraintChange.java.
